description: Allows the user to sprout duplicates of their body parts on any surface within range, functioning as if they were the user's actual limbs.

users.circumstances: Robin ate the fruit as a child

abilityReveals.description: Robin creates multiple arms using her Devil Fruit powers to grab and defeat opponents with a powerful clutch technique. The name uses Spanish spelling consistent with Robin's technique naming convention.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Used to defeat Hammond and destroy his slave tank, freeing the enslaved humans inside during the battle at Gyoncorde Plaza.
